name: Hildas Kasm Registry
description: Hildas store for Kasm supported workspaces.

workspaces.description: Chromium is a free and open-source browser, primarily developed and maintained by Google.
Ubuntu is a Linux distribution based on Debian.
workspaces.notes:
The Kasm Ubuntu Noble Workspace requires libseccomp => 2.5.3 to run.

This can be checked by running runc --version

If you still want to run Ubuntu Noble but do not have the minimum required libseccomp version, it can be run in an unsecure manner by adding: {"security_opt":["seccomp=unconfined"]} to the Docker Run Config Override (JSON) setting above.

NOTE: This will run the Workspace without the docker seccomp sandbox and will significantly reduce the amount of protection that Kasm Workspaces can provide.
